snippet: The vaccine, called Flublok, can be ready more quickly in the event of a pandemic and, unlike current vaccines, will be an option for those allergic to eggs.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves new type of flu vaccine called Flublok, which will be an option for those allergic to eggs; maker Protein Sciences says limited supplies are expected to be available soon.
lead_paragraph: The vaccine, called Flublok, can be ready more quickly in the event of a pandemic and, unlike current vaccines, will be an option for those allergic to eggs.

headline.seo: Flublok, a Flu Vaccine, Wins F.D.A. Approval
headline.main: Rapidly Produced Flu Vaccine Wins F.D.A. Approval
headline.print_headline: Rapidly Produced Flu Vaccine Wins F.D.A. Approval
